text: thumb | 320px | left| Scriabin concert in Melitopol 2014 Andriy "Kuzma" Kuzmenko (; 17 August 1968 - 2 February 2015) was a Ukrainian singer. He was best as the lead singer of the rock band Skryabin, founded in 1989. Kuzmenko was born in Sambir, Lviv Oblast. He was married to Svetlana and had a daughter, Maria-Barbara, born in 1997. Kuzmenko died in a car accident on 2 February 2015 in Lozuvatka, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast, aged 46. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Rock singers Category:Ukrainian singers
title: Andriy Kuzmenko
